VoiceMailMessage.name: VoiceMailMessage

DurationInSeconds.description: The duration of a prerecorded voicemail message in seconds.

IsDefault.description: Specifies whether the message is the context user’s default voicemail drop message.

Name.description: The name of the prerecorded voicemail message.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the prerecorded voicemail message.

VoiceMailMessage.accessRules: As of Spring ’20 and later, only your Salesforce org's internal users can access this object.
